Real World

The experiments in real world were done inside the University of Genoa, in front of the building G, and E, address via dell’Opera Pia 13. There were two ramps with different slopes planner’s performance.



Here is a preview from the experiments done with Boston Dynamics Spot robot in a real world scenario, applying different configurations on the planner.
